author: Mark Focas
comment: I really like this design. The dark background images especially. It would be nice to be able to suppress some images from the auto rotation. Since running this watch face my watch has run out of battery in half the time it usually does, this has happened two or three times. I don't know if it us this app, but I haven't installed anything else in that time period. Nobody else has mentioned this so I only mention in case it helps the developers.
title: Beauiful design

author: Daven Maharaj
comment: Love this watch face...I've tried many others and this one works well, looks great and doesn't drain the battery!  I prefer the digital read out because its easier to read..would be great if the the analog theme also had a small digital read out at the top (so to not interfere with the cards, and moto 360 flat tire.)...  A must have for future releases is the ability to use on white faced designs in the day and black at night. Its just too hard to see the black in direct sunlight.  Cheers!
title: Nice design!

author: K Pennett
comment: Can't complain, so far, it's everything it should be... I don't particularly care about the movements though, just a nice simple image would suffice for me. Or at least the option to disable the movement. & ability to add watch & phone information of you wouldn't mind please. Update: after about a minute, it went black momentarily... And after installation, battery went from having 25hrs to 19hrs available.
title: Simple elegant, & free...

author: David West
comment: I love it when the watch face makers make ambient mode that are elegant, classy, save batter, and are not too bright at night. One thing is I wish there were preferences on this watch when it comes to colors. Just a personal preference, but I like to be able to choose between masculine and feminine designs.
title: Worth it alone for the analog ambient mode face

author: Dat Moose
comment: I just can't change the image and I can't find any options other than the time settings. Hopefully it'll cycle on its own because I'm stuck with a glaringly bright white face. Moto X 2014 with first gen lg g watch.
title: Overall it's nice

author: Carlos Battousai
comment: Pretty good watch face. Just wish we could pick the watch hands colors and pick a set of faces to rotate.  I don't like all of them. HUGE battery drain on my Moto 360
title: Nice

author: Elle Jolly
comment: I normally make my own in Facer, but liked the look of these. The only thing I would want is the option to have the analog second hand rotate while using the digital clock.
title: Beautiful

author: martin borrick
comment: Using this on the Huawei W1. This is the best face I've come across so far, I have many premium paid for collections and it upsets me that I keep coming back to this. Ok it only tells you the time, I like to see the date as well, but what it does it does very well and with such an elegant and pleasing way. Very happy with this free face, should be premium really.

author: Kara Reese
comment: It took me awhile to figure out how to use this.  I fell love with It. It really shows the awesome nature if the moto 360.  I installed this application before I got the watch on Christmas Eve.  I want to explore more options similar to this one.
title: Fantastic!

author: Gelo Goloy
comment: UPDATE: It does not show up on my LG G Watch R even after the update. Nice faces actually look like Apple Watch designs sometimes. Eats up battery quickly on Moto 360 due to animations. Maybe an option to turn animation off in the future?

author: Julia Reyburn
comment: Major flaw: the logo is in the way of notifications in ambient mode, so you have to unlock the watch to see them. Otherwise this would be 5 star!

author: Justin Manuel
comment: This definitely has to be in my list of top five watch faces. I actually feel bad that I haven't paid a dime for it.
title: My Go-to watch face

author: L Guidry
comment: I find myself looking at my watch to see what its going to look like. Its bright and colorful and just what i want.
title: My favorite watch face

author: Viktor Valkov
comment: In ambient mode on moto360 the peek card doesn't cover the signature making it unreadable and ugly.
title: Nice look but bad ambient mode

author: Cory Bell
comment: Love the gorgeous face designs and the hourly cycling images. Also love that the app doesn't ask for Internet access, GPS or anything else that a watch face clearly does not need. If I could ask for anything, it would be: 1) More images (of course) 2) I think the analog display looks much classier, but it would be nice to have the option to add a small digital overlay for easy reading 3) Would be nice to be able to select only "night-time" (black) or "daytime" (white) backgrounds for the cycle
title: My favorite Wear face hands-down

author: Raul Hernandez
comment: I think it'd be a great option to still have an image, at least, in dim mode. The beauty of the watchface can only be appreciate when it's being used and then it dims fairly quickly. I would like to have the option of the face to be visible during dim mode even if the battery was drained more, I wouldn't mind at all.
title: Beautiful.

author: Heather Lukasewycz
comment: Took me a while to figure out how to change the picture (you have to do it from the Android Wear app on your phone) but now that I've got that worked out I love it.
title: Nice

comment: This beautiful, animated face perfectly showcases the tech of Moto 360. Best face I've found so far. I love that it changes day to night.
title: Stunning

author: domenica sanchez
comment: just reinstalled it for the third time,  and it finally shows up on my Android wear options. Beautiful :)

author: KS Zicht
comment: Looks great on my Huawei watch. It works flawlessly and I love how it darkens for evening. People notice my watch because the watchface captures their attention. Very artfully done. Thank you Dev for creating this beautiful face!

author: Angelina Conti
comment: These are my favorite watch faces so far... The annimations are awesome and add a nice touch. The day/white backdrops are gorgeous and elegant,  while the night/black backdrops are vivid and stunning!  I have a tough time choosing so I do the option to cycle new face  every hour!
title: Absolutely gorgeous!!

author: Tony Mace
comment: Would be nice if the text would disappear when in ambient mode as it interferes with peek cards. Also a date toggle would be nice.
title: Nice watch face.

author: Charlotte Melzer
comment: I love this app, the backgrounds are gorgeous, but I wish there was the option to remove images from the auto rotate so I get to see all the images - there are a few beautiful ones that cycle at late night or early morning that I have never seen and others that cycle though the day that I don't like as much. Otherwise I love it!

author: Steve Fournier
comment: I thought this looked a bit girly for my taste so I was hesitant to try it but it's very nicely done. I'd recommend this for anyone.
title: Very nice!

author: Mike Cormier
comment: I have the update on gear live and they still don't show up. I'll give it a better rating when I can get to work.

author: Kevin Lee
comment: Love how the watch face updates each hour. Also love that everytime the watch face turns on.... the background has movement
title: By far one of the most beautiful faces

author: Bonnie Fioretti
comment: Is this watch face for an android wear watch? I have the Asus zenwatch 2 and would love these faces but I can't even open the app on my phone. But the designs I see in the playstore are beautiful. Thanks.

author: Melanie Anderson
comment: Love all the designs! I just wish it had some interactive options so I could easily see the date/weather/how many steps I've taken. But overall it's my favorite watch face!

author: Brooke Hanlin
comment: Gives my watch a more girly look, love the black or white background options and different colors to match what I wear. You can change the colors on your phone through android wear.
title: Awesome!

author: Amy Smith
comment: Clear and easy to read whilst being stylish and cool.
title: Beautiful, feminine and modern.

author: pari sanghvi
comment: Like the way it changes its display..just a small thing is missing in it..pls add date.. other all its #fabulastic
title: Awesome

author: Wayne Alden IV
comment: You must have Android Wear 5 to use this. The watch faces are beautiful and change throughout the day. The background and hands change from white and black, respectively, to black and white as the time transitions from day to night.
title: Beautiful and Dynamic

author: Corey Miecielica
comment: As a first gen watch face, this puppy takes the cake! Beautifully done. I can only imagine what these guys could do with better hardware... and software!
title: Love it!

author: Dawn D
comment: I absolutely love this design but it's incredibly draining on my Zenwatch battery, so I decided to stop using it.
title: Beautiful, but..

author: Dea Levana
comment: I'm using lenovo and when i successfully installed this app, it can't appear in my phone. What should i do? Thx
title: Terrible

author: Danielle Morris
comment: Thanks to previous reviews I've successfully managed this to my liking, otherwise it was hard to operate at first. Super cool spinning picture when touched.
title: I like so far.

comment: 5 star updated. Just had to reinstall for it to show.
title: Doesn't show up on LG G watch

author: SpamFer N8han
comment: I enjoy this watch face. I wish it had more functionality.  Still...perfect in its elegant simplicity.  NO NOTES FOR YOU!  :)
title: Beautiful Watch Face

author: Bill Stringer
comment: Downloaded the watch face for my Samsung Gear Live (even tried re-installing), however, it does not appear in Android Wear as an available face. Please fix!
title: Doesn't show up at all?

author: Bogdan Zurac
comment: Would really like to individually set the background color, since white on AMOLED screens is pretty harsh.
